intro.title: What is this?
intro.body: This is an unofficial alternative to the THI-App, with improved user experience. It was created for students by the computer science club Neuland Ingolstadt e.V. and is not a service provided by the Technischen Hochschule Ingolstadt.

privacy.title: Is my data save?
privacy.body: Yes. Your information is encrypted directly on your device and then send to the THI-Servers via our proxy. Only then is it decrypted. Only the University has access to your login data.

links.data-security: Find out more about data security.

themes.title: Design
themes.notice: To unlock the Hackerman-Design, complete at least four CTF-challenges. To unlock them, visit here.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.notice: Here you can change the order of the entries shown on the dashboard.

install.title: Installation
install.subtext: Do you want to add this App to your smartphone?
install.ios: In Safari press on Share and then on Add to Home Screen.
install.android: On Chrome open the Menu and click on Add to homescreen.

discord.title: Discord-Server
discord.description: The student council of your faculty {{ faculty }} has an offical discord server. You can join it here:

survey.title: Survey
survey.description: The student council wants to arange a deal for a semester ticket. We encourage you to tell us what you think:

timetable.title: Timetable
